title: 1999/343/EC: Commission Decision of 25 May 1999 amending Decision 97/468/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of wild game meat (notified under document number C(1999) 1373) (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 25 May 1999
amending Decision 97/468/EC on drawing up provisional lists of third country establishments from which the Member States authorise imports of wild game meat
(notified under document number C(1999) 1373)
(Text with EEA relevance)
(1999/343/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The text of the Annex to this Decision is added to the Annex of Decision 97/468/EC.
This Decision shall apply from 25 May 1999.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 25 May 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ L 243, 11.10.1995, p. 17.
(2) OJ L 289, 28.10.1998, p. 36.
(3) OJ L 199, 26.7.1997, p. 30.
ANEXO/BILAG/ANHANG/ΠΑΡΑΡΤΗΜΑ/ANNEX/ANNEXE/ALLEGATO/BIJLAGE/ANEXO/LIITE/BILAGA
